name: ip
blocks:
# METADATA
# custom:
#   plainid:
#     kind: Condition IP
#     name: ip
#     id: 8f501585-01b8-4f54-a2a3-e207941cfe79
condition_ip(env) if {
	net.cidr_contains("10.0.0.0/8", env.sourceIp)
}

name: identity con
blocks:
# METADATA
# custom:
#   plainid:
#     kind: Condition Identity
#     name: identity con
#     id: aa03f814-d32c-431b-a452-e9d1ee35bf23
condition_identity(identity) if {
	identity.template == "User"
	identity["Branch"] == "abc"
}

# METADATA
# custom:
#   plainid:
#     kind: Condition Identity
#     name: identity con
#     id: aa03f814-d32c-431b-a452-e9d1ee35bf23
condition_identity(identity) if {
	identity.template == "Employees"
	identity["uid"] == "123"
}
